data_table.description: Neurological History Form, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX1
variable.description: Q1. Informed of Parkinson's disease by doctor [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX1A
variable.description: Q1a. Age When told of Parkinson's disease [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX2
variable.description: Q2. Loss of consciousness due to head injury [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX2A
variable.description: Q2a. Extended loss of consciousness due to head injury [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX2B
variable.description: Q2b. Long-term problems/dysfunction due to head injury [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX3
variable.description: Q3. Have you had a seizure or convulsion? [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX3A
variable.description: Q3a. Number of seizures or convulsions [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX3B
variable.description: Q3b. Age when first seizure occurred [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX3C
variable.description: Q3c. Age when last seizure occurred [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX3D
variable.description: Q3d. Treated with anti-seizure medications [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX3E
variable.description: Q3e. Age when started anti-seizure medications [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX4
variable.description: Q4. Informed of other neuro disorders by doctor [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX4A
variable.description: Q4a. Multiple Sclerosis [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX4A1
variable.description: Q4a1. Multiple sclerosis age at diagnosis [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX4B
variable.description: Q4b. Brain tumor [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX4B1
variable.description: Q4b1. Brain tumor age at diagnosis [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX4C
variable.description: Q4c. Dementia, Alzheimer's, senility, or hardening of brain's arteries [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX4C1
variable.description: Q4c1. Dementia age at diagnosis [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX5
variable.description: Q5. Surgery or radiation therapy of skull or brain [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX5A
variable.description: Q5a. Surgery involving skull or brain [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX5B
variable.description: Q5b. Radiation involving skull or brain [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX6
variable.description: Q6. Depression diagnosis [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX6A
variable.description: A6a. Depression diagnosis [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX6B
variable.description: Q6b. Depression diagnosis [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX6C
variable.description: Q6c. Treatment for depression [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX7
variable.description: Q7. Memory problems [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX8
variable.description: Q8. Vision normal without glasses or contacts [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX9
variable.description: Q9. Usually wear glasses or contact lenses [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX9A
variable.description: Q9a. Vision normal with glasses or contacts [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX10
variable.description: Q10. Hearing normal without aid(s) [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX11
variable.description: Q11. Wear hearing aid(s) [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX11A
variable.description: Q11a. Hearing normal with aid(s) [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX12
variable.description: Q12. Sleepy most of the day [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX13
variable.description: Q13. Days dozing off [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX14
variable.description: Q14. Sleepy most of the day [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX14A
variable.description: Q14a. How often sleepy most of the day [Neurological History Form]
variable.value: Less that three times in total

variable.name: NHX14B
variable.description: Q14b. Age when sleepy started [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX15
variable.description: Q15. Shaking in limbs [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX15A
variable.description: Q15a. Age when shaking started [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX16
variable.description: Q16. Smaller hand writing [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX0AY
variable.description: Q0a. Year of completion date [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX4D
variable.description: Q4d. Stroke or cerebrovascular accident [Neurological History Form]

variable.name: NHX4D1
variable.description: Q4d1. Stroke or cerebrovascular age at diagnosis [Neurological History Form]
